text: "The Wonderful World of the Young" is a song written by Sid Tepper and Roy C. Bennett, and first recorded by American singer Andy Williams, whose version reached No. 99 on the Billboard Hot 100 in March 1962. The following month, a version by British singer Danny Williams was more successful, peaking at No. 8 on the UK Singles Chart. Other versions have been recorded by Lawrence Welk, Phil Tate, and John Treacy Egan. ==References== Category:1962 singles Category:1962 songs Category:Andy Williams songs Category:Danny Williams (singer) songs Category:Songs written by Sid Tepper Category:Songs written by Roy C.
